title: Chairs DeFazio and Titus Release “Problems on Pennsylvania Avenue”— Report on GSA’s Mishandling of the Old Post Office Lease
summary: DeFazio: "…the American people deserve to know their government is not for sale."Washington, D.C. - Today, Chair of the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure Peter DeFazio (D-OR) and Chair of the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management Dina Titus (D-NV) released a staff report on the committee's investigation into the General Services Administration's (GSA) management of the Old Post Office (OPO) Building lease to Trump OPO …
